name: I. “MEDUSA”. SPECIAL EDITION.
description:
SPECIAL BONUS HOLOGRAM EDITION from “Nightmares” collection.
It’s a collection created to celebrate Halloween that revives the most common and darkest nightmares that haunt the human being. 8 collectible card amulets that explain the most terrifying fears and give protection to those who have them.

Description of the piece:
You want to move but you can't, as if you were turned to stone. This paralyzing dream can fill you with anguish. It is related to feelings of fear and negativity for not having under your control some situations in your life.   The most common reason is the result of frustration for being in the midst of various situations that may be difficult to control because you are too afraid to make a decision that you think may lead you to failure.
Decapitated Medusa breaks the spell that has you paralyzed like stone.

MP4 - 1157x1600px

Full story here: nft.matiasmarano.com/nightmares
